dict.acceptation: 神经；勇气，胆量；[植] 叶脉；中枢；

sent.orig: Nerve impulses along the auditory nerve auditory cortex reached the center to form a hearing.
sent.trans: 沿听神经听觉皮层达成的中心，形成听觉神经冲动。

sent.orig: F-wave: normal persistency at the left tibial nerve and left peroneal nerve stimulation.
sent.trans: 波：正常的持久性在左侧胫神经及左腓总神经刺激。

sent.orig: Sex hormon have no effect on laryngeal nerve-tract and nerve fiber.
sent.trans: 喉部神经纤维束的粗细，在变性期后可能不受性激素的影响。

sent.orig: The incidence of ED were 57%, 92% for nerve-sparing RC and non-nerve-sparing RC respectively.
sent.trans: 保留血管神经束膀胱全切ED发生率为57%,而未保留血管神经束者ED发生率为92%。

sent.orig: Conclusions: Sural nerve with peroneal vessels anastomosis is an ideal donor of nerve graft.
sent.trans: 结论：吻合腓血管的腓肠神经是神经移植的优良供体。
